entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Load an image from a stream in Image class for .NET 9 #27856
  • [Android] - Cookies not modified correctly during navigation #27854
  • Unable to set alternate app (Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in Maui Android!! #27853
  • WebAuthenicator Prevents Dialogs From Displaying #27852
  • .net 9 Android ignoring Android primary color #27850
  • OpenUrl AppDelegate not being called #27849
  • [iOS] [Shell] The 'More' tab doesn't respect shell's nav bar customization #27846
  • CollectionView on Tabbed Page crashes on Android #27844
  • CarouselView Items Alignment Not Proper on Windows Platform #27843
  • Android: Native View not set exception on modal page #27841
  • [iOS] App Crash on Startup when Interpreter is used with Release configuration. #27840
  • Images are not displayed in release with AndroidEnableMarshalMethods=true #27838
  • WebView every time take camera and microphone permission. #27836
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid SDK 9.0.2 template broken for VSCode Macos #27833

Closed

  • [iOS] Application crashes when ToolbarItem is created with invalid IconImageSource name #27095
    Backlog
  • iOS MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync closes the wrong modal #27513
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header or footer has incorrect height #27808
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView's height does not include measured height of Header and Footer to size of Content #23435
    Backlog
  • Problems with PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy #27817
  • fontsize tabbedPage not working #27606
  • [Windows] FilePicker.PickAsync exception on Windows Machine #27552
  • CrossConnectivity.Current.IsRemoteReachable in MAUI #27623

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Update slnf location and arcade #27860
    area-infrastructure
  • Update gradle version for AndroidNative app from 7.6.1 to 8.12.1. #27859
    community ✨
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250217201559273 to main #27858
  • [iOS] OnAppearing and OnNavigatedTo don't work when using the 'More' tab - fix #27857
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] [Shell] The 'More' tab - nav bar customization #27848
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #27842
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Mark VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange and VerifyGraphicsViewWithoutGrayLine tests as flaky #27776
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Fix dnceng builds #27855
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fixed the Application crash when ToolbarItem is created with invalid IconImageSource name #27175
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ContextMenu UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #27403
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix concurrency issues and leak reliability #27815
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header or footer has incorrect height - fix #27809
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fixed latitude->longitude typo #27834
    area-essentials, community ✨

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11027353 #27789
  • Update the comment for the test properties #27306
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] try do full build on dnceng #27456
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Use newer API in FilePicker #27521
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
    area-testing
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [BindingSG] Added Binding.Create support for xaml generated sources #27610
    area-xaml
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Move to Sequoia machines #27787
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload - Handle fingerprint when hot reloading scoped CSS bundles #27788
    area-tooling
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Fix crash starting the swipe on SwipeView inside CollectionView #27669
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 5 #27564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout Menu Backdrop Area does not Readjust on Orientation Change #27700
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for CarouselView ItemSpacing property in ItemsLayout not working with CV2 #27056
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Slider Control #27433
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Tabbar icon color wrong on IOS (extended tabbar) - proposal #27825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
